channel.title: Destiny on Noahlias's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Destiny on Noahlias's Blog

item.title: Summary_2024
item.description: Early 2023: The First Arranged Meeting In May 2023, I went through my first arranged meeting, more out of obligation than desire. Though I went through the motions - holding hands, kissing - each gesture felt hollow and forced. It was like acting in a play where I didn’t know my lines, leaving me feeling even more alienated from myself. The emptiness of these actions only amplified my sense of disconnection.
